import React, {useRef} from 'react'; import './Homepage.css' export default function Home() { const zero = useRef(null); const first = useRef(null); const second = useRef(null); const third = useRef(null); const fourth = useRef(null); const scrollToElement = (event,id) => { console.log(first.current); if (id =="zero"){ first.current.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) } }; return (
scrollToElement(event,"zero")}>
